entry.title: Happy, fighting, celebrating, protesting, remembering, paying-tribute-to Pride. Never forget the trans and queer women of color who began Pride. Never forget that Pride began as a riot against police brutality. Never forget that we know who we are. Allies
entry.content: Happy, fighting, celebrating, protesting, remembering, paying-tribute-to Pride. Never forget the trans and queer women of color who began Pride. Never forget that Pride began as a riot against police brutality. Never forget that we know who we are. Allies, get cued into what's going on tomorrow evening at my Trans Activism & You workshop. Register at the link in bio or at pinkmantaray.com/workshops 🏳️‍⚧️💕 #transgender #pride #transpride #transman #transition #genderaffirmation #transisbeautiful #gender #transjoy #transrights

Take a listen to the whole episode at dearschuyler.com or anywhere you get your podcasts! #dearschuyler #podcast #transgender #transpodcast #trans #grace #transphobia #haters #lgbtq #pride

entry.title: So-called "Trans Exclusionary Radical Feminism" or "TERF" ideology is most certainly exclusion - and absolutely NOT feminism. On my podcast this week, I answered several listener questions like this one. I really enjoyed making this episode because I got
entry.content: So-called "Trans Exclusionary Radical Feminism" or "TERF" ideology is most certainly exclusion - and absolutely NOT feminism. On my podcast this week, I answered several listener questions like this one. I really enjoyed making this episode because I got to address many of the things that I know drum up quite a bit of controversy and tension. I hope you find it useful - take a listen to DEAR SCHUYLER anywhere you get your podcasts! #dearschuyler #transgender #transpodcast #podcast

entry.title: Anti-trans rhetoric and transphobia hurt everyone. This nonsense has got to stop. Trans people are not the problem. Everyone is debating where trans people belong but so few people are truly educated on transness. Come to a workshop or take one of my trai
entry.content: Anti-trans rhetoric and transphobia hurt everyone. This nonsense has got to stop. Trans people are not the problem. Everyone is debating where trans people belong but so few people are truly educated on transness. Come to a workshop or take one of my trainings: pinkmantaray.com/workshops 🙏🏼 Get engaged and help fight all this anti-trans, misogynistic, racist propaganda! Shirt by @Greyson!! #transgender #transathlete #transathletesbelonginsports #lettranskidsplay #transkids #protecttranskids #womenssports #girlssports #gender #pride #inclusion
